meanings.definition: A small piece of metal or plastic used to hold things together or to fasten something in place.
meanings.sent1: She used paper clips to keep her papers organized.
meanings.sent2: The teacher showed the students how to use binder clips.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to use hair clips to hold up its acorn stash.
meanings.sent4: His words were like clips, holding her attention tightly.
meanings.sent5: The clips on the necklace sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A short extract from a film or video.
meanings.sent1: The movie trailer showed exciting clips from the upcoming film.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed watching clips of funny cat videos online.
meanings.sent3: The clips of the movie made her laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: The clips of the concert captured the energy of the live performance.
meanings.sent5: The clips of the documentary left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.sent1: She clips coupons to save money on groceries.
meanings.sent2: He clips the bushes in the garden to keep them neat.
meanings.sent3: The barber accidentally clipped a little too much off his hair.
meanings.sent4: Time seems to clip by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The editor decided to clip out the unnecessary scenes from the movie.
